        <td id="L4555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4555"></td>
        <td id="LC4555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So what on earths Hagrid up to?&quot; said Hermione.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4556"></td>
        <td id="LC4556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4557"></td>
        <td id="LC4557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they knocked on the door of the gamekeeper&#39;s hut an hour later, they were surprised to see that all the curtains were closed. Hagrid called &quot;Who is it?&quot; before he let them in, and then shut the door quickly behind them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4558"></td>
        <td id="LC4558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4559"></td>
        <td id="LC4559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was stifling hot inside. Even though it was such a warm day, there was a blazing fire in the grate. Hagrid made them tea and offered them stoat sandwiches, which they refused.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4560"></td>
        <td id="LC4560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4561"></td>
        <td id="LC4561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So – yeh wanted to ask me somethin&#39;?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4562"></td>
        <td id="LC4562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4563"></td>
        <td id="LC4563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes,&quot; said Harry. There was no point beating around the bush. &quot;We were wondering if you could tell us what&#39;s guarding the Sorcerer&#39;s Stone apart from Fluffy.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4564"></td>
        <td id="LC4564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4565"></td>
        <td id="LC4565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hagrid frowned at him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4566"></td>
        <td id="LC4566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4567"></td>
        <td id="LC4567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;0&#39; course I cant, he said. &quot;Number one, I don&#39; know meself. Number two, yeh know too much already, so I wouldn&#39; tell yeh if I could. That Stone&#39;s here fer a good reason. It Was almost stolen outta Gringotts – I s&#39;ppose yeh&#39;ve worked that out an&#39; all? Beats me how yeh even know abou&#39; Fluffy.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4568"></td>
        <td id="LC4568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4569"></td>
        <td id="LC4569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, come on, Hagrid, you might not want to tell us, but you do know, you know everything that goes on round here,&quot; said Hermione in a warm, flattering voice. Hagrid&#39;s beard twitched and they could tell he was smiling. &quot;We only wondered who had done the guarding, really.&quot; Hermione went on. &quot;We wondered who Dumbledore had trusted enough to help him, apart from you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4570"></td>
        <td id="LC4570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4571"></td>
        <td id="LC4571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hagrid&#39;s chest swelled at these last words. Harry and Ron beamed at Hermione.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4572"></td>
        <td id="LC4572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4573"></td>
        <td id="LC4573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, I don&#39; s&#39;pose it could hurt ter tell yeh that... let&#39;s see... he borrowed Fluffy from me... then some o&#39; the teachers did enchantments... Professor Sprout – Professor Flitwick – Professor McGonagall –&quot; he ticked them off on his fingers, &quot;Professor Quirrell – an&#39; Dumbledore himself did somethin&#39;, o&#39; course. Hang on, I&#39;ve forgotten someone. Oh yeah, Professor Snape.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4574"></td>
        <td id="LC4574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4575"></td>
        <td id="LC4575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Snape?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4576"></td>
        <td id="LC4576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4577"></td>
        <td id="LC4577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yeah – yer not still on abou&#39; that, are yeh? Look, Snape helped protect the Stone, he&#39;s not about ter steal it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4578"></td>
        <td id="LC4578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4579"></td>
        <td id="LC4579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry knew Ron and Hermione were thinking the same as he was. If Snape had been in on protecting the Stone, it must have been easy to find out how the other teachers had guarded it. He probably knew everything – except, it seemed, Quirrell&#39;s spell and how to get past Fluffy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4580"></td>
        <td id="LC4580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4581"></td>
        <td id="LC4581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You&#39;re the only one who knows how to get past Fluffy. aren&#39;t you, Hagrid?&quot; said Harry anxiously. &quot;And you wouldn&#39;t tell anyone, would you? Not even one of the teachers?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4582"></td>
        <td id="LC4582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4583"></td>
        <td id="LC4583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Not a soul knows except me an&#39; Dumbledore,&quot; said Hagrid proudly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4584"></td>
        <td id="LC4584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4585"></td>
        <td id="LC4585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, that&#39;s something,&quot; Harry muttered to the others. &quot;Hagrid, can we have a window open? I&#39;m boiling.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4586"></td>
        <td id="LC4586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4587"></td>
        <td id="LC4587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Can&#39;t, Harry, sorry,&quot; said Hagrid. Harry noticed him glance at the fire. Harry looked at it, too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4588"></td>
        <td id="LC4588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4589"></td>
        <td id="LC4589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hagrid – what&#39;s that?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4590"></td>
        <td id="LC4590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4591"></td>
        <td id="LC4591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But he already knew what it was. In the very heart of the fire, underneath the kettle, was a huge, black egg.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4592"></td>
        <td id="LC4592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4593"></td>
        <td id="LC4593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah,&quot; said Hagrid, fiddling nervously with his beard, &quot;That&#39;s er...&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4594"></td>
        <td id="LC4594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4595"></td>
        <td id="LC4595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Where did you get it, Hagrid?&quot; said Ron, crouching over the fire to get a closer look at the egg. &quot;It must&#39;ve cost you a fortune.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4596"></td>
        <td id="LC4596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4597"></td>
        <td id="LC4597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Won it,&quot; said Hagrid. &quot;Las&#39; night. I was down in the village havin&#39; a few drinks an&#39; got into a game o&#39; cards with a stranger. Think he was quite glad ter get rid of it, ter be honest.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4598"></td>
        <td id="LC4598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4599"></td>
        <td id="LC4599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But what are you going to do with it when it&#39;s hatched?&quot; said Hermione.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4600"></td>
        <td id="LC4600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4601"></td>
        <td id="LC4601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, I&#39;ve bin doin&#39; some readin&#39; , said Hagrid, pulling a large book from under his pillow. &quot;Got this outta the library – Dragon Breeding for Pleasure and Profit – it&#39;s a bit outta date, o&#39; course, but it&#39;s all in here. Keep the egg in the fire, &#39;cause their mothers breathe on I em, see, an&#39; when it hatches, feed it on a bucket o&#39; brandy mixed with chicken blood every half hour. An&#39; see here – how ter recognize diff&#39;rent eggs – what I got there&#39;s a Norwegian Ridgeback. They&#39;re rare, them.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4602"></td>
        <td id="LC4602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4603"></td>
        <td id="LC4603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He looked very pleased with himself, but Hermione didn&#39;t.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4604"></td>
        <td id="LC4604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4605"></td>
        <td id="LC4605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hagrid, you live in a wooden house,&quot; she said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4606"></td>
        <td id="LC4606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4607"></td>
        <td id="LC4607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Hagrid wasn&#39;t listening. He was humming merrily as he stoked the fire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4608"></td>
        <td id="LC4608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4609"></td>
        <td id="LC4609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So now they had something else to worry about: what might happen to Hagrid if anyone found out he was hiding an illegal dragon in his hut. &quot;Wonder what it&#39;s like to have a peaceful life,&quot; Ron sighed, as evening after evening they struggled through all the extra homework they were getting. Hermione had now started making study schedules for Harry and Ron, too. It was driving them nuts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4610"></td>
        <td id="LC4610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4611"></td>
        <td id="LC4611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, one breakfast time, Hedwig brought Harry another note from Hagrid. He had written only two words: It&#39;s hatching.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4612"></td>
        <td id="LC4612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4613"></td>
        <td id="LC4613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron wanted to skip Herbology and go straight down to the hut. Hermione wouldn&#39;t hear of it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4614"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4616"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4620"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC4621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Malfoy was only a few feet away and he had stopped dead to listen. How much had he heard? Harry didn&#39;t like the look on Malfoy&#39;s face at all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4622"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4623"></td>
        <td id="LC4623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron and Hermione argued all the way to Herbology and in the end, Hermione agreed to run down to Hagrid&#39;s with the other two during morning break. When the bell sounded from the castle at the end of their lesson, the three of them dropped their trowels at once and hurried through the grounds to the edge of the forest. Hagrid greeted them, looking flushed and excited.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4624"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4626"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4627"></td>
        <td id="LC4627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The egg was lying on the table. There were deep cracks in it. Something was moving inside; a funny clicking noise was coming from it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4628"></td>
        <td id="LC4628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L4629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4629"></td>
        <td id="LC4629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They all drew their chairs up to the table and watched with bated breath.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4630"></td>
        <td id="LC4630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4631"></td>
        <td id="LC4631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All at once there was a scraping noise and the egg split open. The baby dragon flopped onto the table. It wasn&#39;t exactly pretty; Harry thought it looked like a crumpled, black umbrella. Its spiny wings were huge compared to its skinny jet body, it had a long snout with wide nostrils, the stubs of horns and bulging, orange eyes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4632"></td>
        <td id="LC4632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4634"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hagrid was about to answer when the color suddenly drained from his face – he leapt to his feet and ran to the window.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4648"></td>

        <td id="LC4651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Something about the smile lurking on Malfoy&#39;s face during the next week made Harry, Ron, and Hermione very nervous. They spent most of their free time in Hagrid&#39;s darkened hut, trying to reason with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4652"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4653"></td>
        <td id="LC4653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Just let him go,&quot; Harry urged. &quot;Set him free.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4654"></td>
        <td id="LC4654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4655"></td>
        <td id="LC4655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I can&#39;t,&quot; said Hagrid. &quot;He&#39;s too little. He&#39;d die.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4656"></td>
        <td id="LC4656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4657"></td>
        <td id="LC4657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They looked at the dragon. It had grown three times in length in just a week. Smoke kept furling out of its nostrils. Hagrid hadn&#39;t been doing his gamekeeping duties because the dragon was keeping him so busy. There were empty brandy bottles and chicken feathers all over the floor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4658"></td>
        <td id="LC4658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4659"></td>
        <td id="LC4659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;ve decided to call him Norbert,&quot; said Hagrid, looking at the dragon with misty eyes. &quot;He really knows me now, watch. Norbert! Norbert! Where&#39;s Mommy?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4660"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4662"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4664"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4665"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4666"></td>
        <td id="LC4666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4667"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4668"></td>
        <td id="LC4668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4669"></td>
        <td id="LC4669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry suddenly turned to Ron. Charlie, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4670"></td>
        <td id="LC4670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4671"></td>
        <td id="LC4671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You&#39;re losing it, too,&quot; said Ron. &quot;I&#39;m Ron, remember?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4672"></td>
        <td id="LC4672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4673"></td>
        <td id="LC4673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No – Charlie – your brother, Charlie. In Romania. Studying dragons. We could send Norbert to him. Charlie can take care of him and then put him back in the wild!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4674"></td>
        <td id="LC4674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4675"></td>
        <td id="LC4675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Brilliant!&quot; said Ron. &quot;How about it, Hagrid?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4676"></td>
        <td id="LC4676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4677"></td>
        <td id="LC4677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And in the end, Hagrid agreed that they could send -an owl to Charlie to ask him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4678"></td>
        <td id="LC4678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4679"></td>
        <td id="LC4679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The following week dragged by. Wednesday night found Hermione and Harry sitting alone in the common room, long after everyone else had gone to bed. The clock on the wall had just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4680"></td>
        <td id="LC4680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4681"></td>
        <td id="LC4681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chimed midnight when the portrait hole burst open. Ron appeared out of nowhere as he pulled off Harry&#39;s invisibility cloak. He had been down at Hagrid&#39;s hut, helping him feed Norbert, who was now eating dead rats by the crate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4682"></td>
        <td id="LC4682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4683"></td>
        <td id="LC4683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It bit me!&quot; he said, showing them his hand, which was wrapped in a bloody handkerchief. &quot;I&#39;m not going to be able to hold a quill for a week. I tell you, that dragon&#39;s the most horrible animal I&#39;ve ever met, but the way Hagrid goes on about it, you&#39;d think it was a fluffy little bunny rabbit. When it bit me he told me off for frightening it. And when I left, he was singing it a lullaby.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4684"></td>
        <td id="LC4684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4688"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4691"></td>

        <td id="L4692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4692"></td>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How are you? Thanks for the letter – I&#39;d be glad to take the Norwegian Ridgeback, but it won&#39;t be easy getting him here. I think the best thing will be to send him over with some friends of mine who are coming to visit me next week. Trouble is, they mustn&#39;t be seen carrying an illegal dragon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4694"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4696"></td>

        <td id="LC4705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We&#39;ve got the invisibility cloak,&quot; said Harry. &quot;It shouldn&#39;t be too difficult – I think the cloaks big enough to cover two of us and Norbert.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4706"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4707"></td>
        <td id="LC4707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a mark of how bad the last week had been that the other two agreed with him. Anything to get rid of Norbert – and Malfoy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4708"></td>

        <td id="L4709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4709"></td>
        <td id="LC4709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a hitch. By the next morning, Ron&#39;s bitten hand had swollen to twice its usual size. He didn&#39;t know whether it was safe to go to Madam Pomfrey – would she recognize a dragon bite? By the afternoon, though, he had no choice. The cut had turned a nasty shade of green. It looked as if Norbert&#39;s fangs were poisonous.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4710"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4711"></td>
        <td id="LC4711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry and Hermione rushed up to the hospital wing at the end of the day to find Ron in a terrible state in bed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4712"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC4713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s not just my hand,&quot; he whispered, &quot;although that feels like it&#39;s about to fall off. Malfoy told Madam Pomfrey he wanted to borrow one of my books so he could come and have a good laugh at me. He kept threatening to tell her what really bit me – I&#39;ve told her it was a dog, but I don&#39;t think she believes me -I shouldn&#39;t have hit him at the Quidditch match, that&#39;s why he&#39;s doing this.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC4721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry and Hermione didn&#39;t get a chance to answer. Madam Pomfrey came over at that moment and made them leave, saying Ron needed sleep.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4722"></td>

We&#39;ll have to risk it. And we have got the invisibility cloak, Malfoy doesn&#39;t know about that.&quot;</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4734"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4735"></td>
        <td id="LC4735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They would have felt sorry for Hagrid when the time came for him to say good-bye to Norbert if they hadn&#39;t been so worried about what they had to do. It was a very dark, cloudy night, and they were a bit late arriving at Hagrid&#39;s hut because they&#39;d had to wait for Peeves to get out of their way in the entrance hall, where he&#39;d been playing tennis against the wall. Hagrid had Norbert packed and ready in a large crate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4736"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">From inside the crate came ripping noises that sounded to Harry as though the teddy was having his head torn off.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4740"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4742"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4743"></td>
        <td id="LC4743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How they managed to get the crate back up to the castle, they never knew. Midnight ticked nearer as they heaved Norbert up the marble staircase in the entrance hall and along the dark corridors. UP another staircase, then another – even one of Harry&#39;s shortcuts didn&#39;t make the work much easier.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4744"></td>
        <td id="LC4744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4745"></td>
        <td id="LC4745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Nearly there!&quot; Harry panted as they reached the corridor beneath the tallest tower.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4746"></td>
        <td id="LC4746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4747"></td>
        <td id="LC4747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then a sudden movement ahead of them made them almost drop the crate. Forgetting that they were already invisible, they shrank into the shadows, staring at the dark outlines of two people grappling with each other ten feet away. A lamp flared.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4748"></td>
        <td id="LC4748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4749"></td>
        <td id="LC4749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor McGonagall, in a tartan bathrobe and a hair net, had Malfoy by the ear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4750"></td>
        <td id="LC4750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4751"></td>
        <td id="LC4751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Detention!&quot; she shouted. &quot;And twenty points from Slytherin! Wandering around in the middle of the night, how dare you –&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4752"></td>
        <td id="LC4752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4753"></td>
        <td id="LC4753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You don&#39;t understand, Professor. Harry Potter&#39;s coming – he&#39;s got a dragon!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4754"></td>
        <td id="LC4754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4755"></td>
