        <td id="L5000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5000"></td>
        <td id="LC5000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yeah, but I was meanin&#39; anythin&#39; unusual a bit nearer home, said Hagrid. &quot;So yeh haven&#39;t noticed anythin&#39; strange?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5001"></td>
        <td id="LC5001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5002"></td>
        <td id="LC5002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yet again, Ronan took a while to answer. At last, he said, &quot;The forest hides many secrets.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5003"></td>
        <td id="LC5003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5004"></td>
        <td id="LC5004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A movement in the trees behind Ronan made Hagrid raise his bow again, but it was only a second centaur, black-haired and -bodied and wilder-looking than Ronan.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5005"></td>
        <td id="LC5005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5006"></td>
        <td id="LC5006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hullo, Bane,&quot; said Hagrid. &quot;All right?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5007"></td>
        <td id="LC5007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5008"></td>
        <td id="LC5008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good evening, Hagrid, I hope you are well?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5009"></td>
        <td id="LC5009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5010"></td>
        <td id="LC5010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well enough. Look, I&#39;ve jus&#39; bin askin&#39; Ronan, you seen anythin&#39; odd in here lately? There&#39;s a unicorn bin injured – would yeh know anythin&#39; about it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5011"></td>
        <td id="LC5011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5012"></td>
        <td id="LC5012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bane walked over to stand next to Ronan. He looked skyward. &quot;Mars is bright tonight,&quot; he said simply.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5013"></td>
        <td id="LC5013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5014"></td>
        <td id="LC5014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We&#39;ve heard,&quot; said Hagrid grumpily. &quot;Well, if either of you do see anythin&#39;, let me know, won&#39;t yeh? We&#39;ll be off, then.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5015"></td>
        <td id="LC5015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5016"></td>
        <td id="LC5016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry and Hermione followed him out of the clearing, staring over their shoulders at Ronan and Bane until the trees blocked their view.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5017"></td>
        <td id="LC5017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5018"></td>
        <td id="LC5018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Never,&quot; said Hagrid irritably, &quot;try an&#39; get a straight answer out of a centaur. Ruddy stargazers. Not interested in anythin&#39; closer&#39;n the moon.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5019"></td>
        <td id="LC5019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5020"></td>
        <td id="LC5020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Are there many of them in here?&quot; asked Hermione.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5021"></td>
        <td id="LC5021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5022"></td>
        <td id="LC5022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, a fair few... Keep themselves to themselves mostly, but they&#39;re good enough about turnin&#39; up if ever I want a word. They&#39;re deep, mind, centaurs... they know things... jus&#39; don&#39; let on much.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5023"></td>
        <td id="LC5023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5024"></td>
        <td id="LC5024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;D&#39;you think that was a centaur we heard earlier?&quot; said Harry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5025"></td>
        <td id="LC5025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5026"></td>
        <td id="LC5026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Did that sound like hooves to you? Nah, if yeh ask me, that was what&#39;s bin killin&#39; the unicorns – never heard anythin&#39; like it before.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5027"></td>
        <td id="LC5027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5028"></td>
        <td id="LC5028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They walked on through the dense, dark trees. Harry kept looking nervously over his shoulder. He had the nasty feeling they were being watched. He was very glad they had Hagrid and his crossbow with them. They had just passed a bend in the path when Hermione grabbed Hagrid&#39;s arm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5029"></td>
        <td id="LC5029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5030"></td>
        <td id="LC5030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hagrid! Look! Red sparks, the others are in trouble!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5031"></td>
        <td id="LC5031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5032"></td>
        <td id="LC5032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You two wait here!&quot; Hagrid shouted. &quot;Stay on the path, I&#39;ll come back for yeh!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5033"></td>
        <td id="LC5033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5034"></td>
        <td id="LC5034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They heard him crashing away through the undergrowth and stood looking at each other, very scared, until they couldn&#39;t hear anything but the rustling of leaves around them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5035"></td>
        <td id="LC5035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5036"></td>
        <td id="LC5036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You don&#39;t think they&#39;ve been hurt, do you?&quot; whispered Hermione.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5037"></td>
        <td id="LC5037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5038"></td>
        <td id="LC5038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I don&#39;t care if Malfoy has, but if something&#39;s got Neville... it&#39;s our fault he&#39;s here in the first place.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5039"></td>
        <td id="LC5039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5040"></td>
        <td id="LC5040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The minutes dragged by. Their ears seemed sharper than usual. Harry&#39;s seemed to be picking up every sigh of the wind, every cracking twig. What was going on? Where were the others?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5041"></td>
        <td id="LC5041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5042"></td>
        <td id="LC5042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At last, a great crunching noise announced Hagrid&#39;s return. Malfoy, Neville, and Fang were with him. Hagrid was fuming. Malfoy, it seemed, had sneaked up behind Neville and grabbed him as a joke. Neville had panicked and sent up the sparks.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5043"></td>
        <td id="LC5043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5044"></td>
        <td id="LC5044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We&#39;ll be lucky ter catch anythin&#39; now, with the racket you two were makin&#39;. Right, we&#39;re changin&#39; groups – Neville, you stay with me an&#39; Hermione, Harry, you go with Fang an&#39; this idiot. I&#39;m sorry,&quot; Hagrid added in a whisper to Harry, &quot;but he&#39;ll have a harder time frightenin&#39; you, an&#39; we&#39;ve gotta get this done.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5045"></td>
        <td id="LC5045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5046"></td>
        <td id="LC5046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So Harry set off into the heart of the forest with Malfoy and Fang. They walked for nearly half an hour, deeper and deeper into the forest, until the path became almost impossible to follow because the trees were so thick. Harry thought the blood seemed to be getting thicker. There were splashes on the roots of a tree, as though the poor creature had been thrashing around in pain close by. Harry could see a clearing ahead, through the tangled branches of an ancient oak.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5047"></td>
        <td id="LC5047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5048"></td>
        <td id="LC5048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Look –&quot; he murmured, holding out his arm to stop Malfoy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5049"></td>
        <td id="LC5049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5050"></td>
        <td id="LC5050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Something bright white was gleaming on the ground. They inched closer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5051"></td>
        <td id="LC5051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5052"></td>
        <td id="LC5052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the unicorn all right, and it was dead. Harry had never seen anything so beautiful and sad. Its long, slender legs were stuck out at odd angles where it had fallen and its mane was spread pearly-white on the dark leaves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5053"></td>
        <td id="LC5053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5054"></td>
        <td id="LC5054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry had taken one step toward it when a slithering sound made him freeze where he stood. A bush on the edge of the clearing quivered.... Then, out of the shadows, a hooded figure came crawling across the ground like some stalking beast. Harry, Malfoy, and Fang stood transfixed. The cloaked figure reached the unicorn, lowered its head over the wound in the animal&#39;s side, and began to drink its blood.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5055"></td>
        <td id="LC5055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5056"></td>
        <td id="LC5056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;AAAAAAAAAARGH!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5057"></td>
        <td id="LC5057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5058"></td>
        <td id="LC5058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Malfoy let out a terrible scream and bolted – so did Fang. The hooded figure raised its head and looked right at Harry – unicorn blood was dribbling down its front. It got to its feet and came swiftly toward Harry – he couldn&#39;t move for fear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5059"></td>
        <td id="LC5059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5060"></td>
        <td id="LC5060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then a pain like he&#39;d never felt before pierced his head; it was as though his scar were on fire. Half blinded, he staggered backward. He heard hooves behind him, galloping, and something jumped clean over Harry, charging at the figure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5061"></td>
        <td id="LC5061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5062"></td>
        <td id="LC5062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The pain in Harry&#39;s head was so bad he fell to his knees. It took a minute or two to pass. When he looked up, the figure had gone. A centaur was standing over him, not Ronan or Bane; this one looked younger; he had white-blond hair and a palomino body.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5063"></td>
        <td id="LC5063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5064"></td>
        <td id="LC5064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Are you all right?&quot; said the centaur, pulling Harry to his feet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5065"></td>
        <td id="LC5065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5066"></td>
        <td id="LC5066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes – thank you – what was that?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5067"></td>
        <td id="LC5067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5068"></td>
        <td id="LC5068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The centaur didn&#39;t answer. He had astonishingly blue eyes, like pale sapphires. He looked carefully at Harry, his eyes lingering on the scar that stood out, livid, on Harry&#39;s forehead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5069"></td>
        <td id="LC5069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5070"></td>
        <td id="LC5070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are the Potter boy,&quot; he said. &quot;You had better get back to Hagrid. The forest is not safe at this time – especially for you. Can you ride? It will be quicker this way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5071"></td>
        <td id="LC5071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5072"></td>
        <td id="LC5072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My name is Firenze,&quot; he added, as he lowered himself on to his front legs so that Harry could clamber onto his back.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5073"></td>
        <td id="LC5073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5074"></td>
        <td id="LC5074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was suddenly a sound of more galloping from the other side of the clearing. Ronan and Bane came bursting through the trees, their flanks heaving and sweaty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5075"></td>
        <td id="LC5075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5076"></td>
        <td id="LC5076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Firenze!&quot; Bane thundered. &quot;What are you doing? You have a human on your back! Have you no shame? Are you a common mule?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5077"></td>
        <td id="LC5077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5078"></td>
        <td id="LC5078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do you realize who this is?&quot; said Firenze. &quot;This is the Potter boy. The quicker he leaves this forest, the better.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5079"></td>
        <td id="LC5079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5080"></td>
        <td id="LC5080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What have you been telling him?&quot; growled Bane. &quot;Remember, Firenze, we are sworn not to set ourselves against the heavens. Have we not read what is to come in the movements of the planets?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5081"></td>
        <td id="LC5081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5082"></td>
        <td id="LC5082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ronan pawed the ground nervously. &quot;I&#39;m sure Firenze thought he was acting for the best, &quot; he said in his gloomy voice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5083"></td>
        <td id="LC5083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5084"></td>
        <td id="LC5084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bane kicked his back legs in anger.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5085"></td>
        <td id="LC5085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5086"></td>
        <td id="LC5086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;For the best! What is that to do with us? Centaurs are concerned with what has been foretold! It is not our business to run around like donkeys after stray humans in our forest!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5087"></td>
        <td id="LC5087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5088"></td>
        <td id="LC5088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Firenze suddenly reared on to his hind legs in anger, so that Harry had to grab his shoulders to stay on.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5089"></td>
        <td id="LC5089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5090"></td>
        <td id="LC5090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do you not see that unicorn?&quot; Firenze bellowed at Bane. &quot;Do you not understand why it was killed? Or have the planets not let you in on that secret? I set myself against what is lurking in this forest, Bane, yes, with humans alongside me if I must.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5091"></td>
        <td id="LC5091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5092"></td>
        <td id="LC5092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And Firenze whisked around; with Harry clutching on as best he could, they plunged off into the trees, leaving Ronan and Bane behind them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5093"></td>
        <td id="LC5093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5094"></td>
        <td id="LC5094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry didn&#39;t have a clue what was going on.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5095"></td>
        <td id="LC5095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5096"></td>
        <td id="LC5096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why&#39;s Bane so angry?&quot; he asked. &quot;What was that thing you saved me from, anyway?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5097"></td>
        <td id="LC5097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5098"></td>
        <td id="LC5098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Firenze slowed to a walk, warned Harry to keep his head bowed in case of low-hanging branches, but did not answer Harry&#39;s question. They made their way through the trees in silence for so long that Harry thought Firenze didn&#39;t want to talk to him anymore. They were passing through a particularly dense patch of trees, however, when Firenze suddenly stopped.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5099"></td>
        <td id="LC5099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5100"></td>
        <td id="LC5100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Harry Potter, do you know what unicorn blood is used -for?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5101"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No,&quot; said Harry, startled by the odd question. &quot;We&#39;ve only used the horn and tail hair in Potions.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5103"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5104"></td>
        <td id="LC5104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That is because it is a monstrous thing, to slay a unicorn,&quot; said Firenze. &quot;Only one who has nothing to lose, and everything to gain, would commit such a crime. The blood of a unicorn will keep you alive, even if you are an inch from death, but at a terrible price. You have slain something pure and defenseless to save yourself, and you will have but a half-life, a cursed life, from the moment the blood touches your lips.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5105"></td>

        <td id="LC5106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry stared at the back of Firenze&#39;s head, which was dappled silver in the moonlight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5107"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But who&#39;d be that desperate?&quot; he wondered aloud. &quot;If you&#39;re going to be cursed forever, deaths better, isn&#39;t it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5109"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is,&quot; Firenze agreed, &quot;unless all you need is to stay alive long enough to drink something else – something that will bring you back to full strength and power – something that will mean you can never die. Mr. Potter, do you know what is hidden in the school at this very moment?&quot;</td>
      </tr>

Dunno if he had enough human left in him to die.&quot;</td>

He shouted something about Quidditch fouls when Harry roughly shook him awake. In a matter of seconds, though, he was wide-eyed as Harry began to tell him and Hermione what had happened in the forest.</td>
      </tr>

Bane was furious... he was talking about interfering with what the planets say is going to happen.... They must show that Voldemort&#39;s coming back.... Bane thinks Firenze should have let Voldemort kill me.... I suppose that&#39;s written in the stars as well.&quot;</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5149"></td>

        <td id="LC5150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hermione looked very frightened, but she had a word of comfort.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5151"></td>

        <td id="L5152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5152"></td>
        <td id="LC5152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Harry, everyone says Dumbledore&#39;s the only one You-Know-Who was ever afraid of With Dumbledore around, You-Know-Who won&#39;t touch you. Anyway, who says the centaurs are right? It sounds like fortune-telling to me, and Professor McGonagall says that&#39;s a very imprecise branch of magic.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5153"></td>
        <td id="LC5153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L5154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5154"></td>
        <td id="LC5154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The sky had turned light before they stopped talking. They went to bed exhausted, their throats sore. But the night&#39;s surprises weren&#39;t over.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5155"></td>

        <td id="LC5156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When Harry pulled back his sheets, he found his invisibility cloak folded neatly underneath them. There was a note pinned to it:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5164"></td>
        <td id="LC5164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER SIXTEEN</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5165"></td>
        <td id="LC5165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5166"></td>
        <td id="LC5166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5167"></td>
        <td id="LC5167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5168"></td>
        <td id="LC5168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5169"></td>
        <td id="LC5169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THROUGH THE TRAPDOOR</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5170"></td>
        <td id="LC5170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5171"></td>
        <td id="LC5171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5172"></td>
        <td id="LC5172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5173"></td>
        <td id="LC5173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In years to come, Harry would never quite remember how he had managed to get through his exams when he half expected Voldemort to come bursting through the door at any moment. Yet the days crept by, and there could be no doubt that Fluffy was still alive and well behind the locked door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5174"></td>
        <td id="LC5174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5175"></td>
        <td id="LC5175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was sweltering hot, especially in the large classroom where they did their written papers. They had been given special, new quills for the exams, which had been bewitched with an AntiCheating spell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5176"></td>
        <td id="LC5176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5177"></td>
        <td id="LC5177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They had practical exams as well. Professor Flitwick called them one by one into his class to see if they could make a pineapple tapdance across a desk. Professor McGonagall watched them turn a mouse into a snuffbox – points were given for how pretty the snuffbox was, but taken away if it had whiskers. Snape made them all nervous, breathing down their necks while they tried to remember how to make a Forgetfulness potion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5178"></td>
        <td id="LC5178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5179"></td>
        <td id="LC5179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry did the best he could, trying to ignore the stabbing pains in his forehead, which had been bothering him ever since his trip into the forest. Neville thought Harry had a bad case of exam nerves because Harry couldn&#39;t sleep, but the truth was that Harry kept being woken by his old nightmare, except that it was now worse than ever because there was a hooded figure dripping blood in it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5180"></td>
        <td id="LC5180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5181"></td>
        <td id="LC5181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Maybe it was because they hadn&#39;t seen what Harry had seen in the forest, or because they didn&#39;t have scars burning on their foreheads, but Ron and Hermione didn&#39;t seem as worried about the Stone as Harry. The idea of Voldemort certainly scared them, but he didn&#39;t keep visiting them in dreams, and they were so busy with their studying they didn&#39;t have much time to fret about what Snape or anyone else might be up to.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5182"></td>
        <td id="LC5182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5183"></td>
        <td id="LC5183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their very last exam was History of Magic. One hour of answering questions about batty old wizards who&#39;d invented selfstirring cauldrons and they&#39;d be free, free for a whole wonderful week until their exam results came out. When the ghost of Professor Binns told them to put down their quills and roll up their parchment, Harry couldn&#39;t help cheering with the rest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5184"></td>
        <td id="LC5184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5185"></td>
        <td id="LC5185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That was far easier than I thought it would be,&quot; said Hermione as they joined the crowds flocking out onto the sunny grounds. &quot;I needn&#39;t have learned about the 1637 Werewolf Code of Conduct or the uprising of Elfric the Eager.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5186"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5187"></td>
        <td id="LC5187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hermione always liked to go through their exam papers afterward, but Ron said this made him feel ill, so they wandered down to the lake and flopped under a tree. The Weasley twins and Lee Jordan were tickling the tentacles of a giant squid, which was basking in the warm shallows. &quot;No more studying,&quot; Ron sighed happily, stretching out on the grass. &quot;You could look more cheerful, Harry, we&#39;ve got a week before we find out how badly we&#39;ve done, there&#39;s no need to worry yet.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5188"></td>

        <td id="L5189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5189"></td>
        <td id="LC5189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry was rubbing his forehead.</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

And Neville will play Quidditch for England before Hagrid lets Dumbledore down.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry nodded, but he couldn&#39;t shake off a lurking feeling that there was something he&#39;d forgotten to do, something important. When he tried to explain this, Hermione said, &quot;That&#39;s just the exams. I woke up last night and was halfway through my Transfiguration notes before I remembered we&#39;d done that one.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry was quite sure the unsettled feeling didn&#39;t have anything to do with work, though. He watched an owl flutter toward the school across the bright blue sky, a note clamped in its mouth. Hagrid was the only one who ever sent him letters. Hagrid would never betray Dumbledore. Hagrid would never tell anyone how to get past Fluffy... never... but –</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC5233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Mighta come up,&quot; said Hagrid, frowning as he tried to remember. &quot;Yeah... he asked what I did, an&#39; I told him I was gamekeeper here.... He asked a bit about the sorta creatures I took after... so I told him... an&#39; I said what I&#39;d always really wanted was a dragon... an&#39; then... I can&#39; remember too well, &#39;cause he kept buyin&#39; me drinks.... Let&#39;s see... yeah, then he said he had the dragon egg an&#39; we could play cards fer it if I wanted... but he had ter be sure I could handle it, he didn&#39; want it ter go ter any old home.... So I told him, after Fluffy, a dragon would be easy...&quot;</td>

        <td id="LC5243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry, Ron, and Hermione didn&#39;t speak to each other at all until they came to a halt in the entrance hall, which seemed very cold and gloomy after the grounds.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5256"></td>

        <td id="LC5257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;See Professor Dumbledore?&quot; Professor McGonagall repeated, as though this was a very fishy thing to want to do. &quot;Why?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5258"></td>
        <td id="LC5258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5259"></td>
        <td id="LC5259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry swallowed – now what?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5260"></td>
        <td id="LC5260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5261"></td>
        <td id="LC5261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s sort of secret,&quot; he said, but he wished at once he hadn&#39;t, because Professor McGonagall&#39;s nostrils flared.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

Hermione, you&#39;d better do that.&quot;</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5328"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I suppose you think you&#39;re harder to get past than a pack of enchantments!&quot; she stormed. &quot;Enough of this nonsense! If I hear you &#39;ve come anywhere near here again, I&#39;ll take another fifty points from Gryffindor! Yes, Weasley, from my own house!&quot; Harry and Ron went back to the common room, Harry had just said, &quot;At least Hermione&#39;s on Snape&#39;s tail,&quot; when the portrait of the Fat Lady swung open and Hermione came in.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC5341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You can&#39;t!&quot; said Hermione. &quot;After what McGonagall and Snape have said? You&#39;ll be expelled!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5342"></td>
        <td id="LC5342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5343"></td>
        <td id="LC5343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;SO WHAT&quot; Harry shouted. &quot;Don&#39;t you understand? If Snape gets hold of the Stone, Voldemort&#39;s coming back! Haven&#39;t you heard what it was like when he was trying to take over? There won&#39;t be any Hogwarts to get expelled from! He&#39;ll flatten it, or turn it into a school for the Dark Arts! Losing points doesn&#39;t matter anymore, can&#39;t you see? D&#39;you think he&#39;ll leave you and your families alone if Gryffindor wins the house cup? If I get caught before I can get to the Stone, well, I&#39;ll have to go back to the Dursleys and wait for Voldemort to find me there, it&#39;s only dying a bit later than I would have, because I&#39;m never going over to the Dark Side! I&#39;m going through that trapdoor tonight and nothing you two say is going to stop me! Voldemort killed my parents, remember?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5344"></td>
        <td id="LC5344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5345"></td>
        <td id="LC5345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He glared at them. &quot;You&#39;re right Harry,&quot; said Hermione in a small voice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5346"></td>
        <td id="LC5346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5347"></td>
        <td id="LC5347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;ll use the invisibility cloak,&quot; said Harry. &quot;It&#39;s just lucky I got it back.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5348"></td>
        <td id="LC5348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5349"></td>
        <td id="LC5349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But will it cover all three of us?&quot; said Ron.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5350"></td>
        <td id="LC5350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5351"></td>
        <td id="LC5351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All – all three of us?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5352"></td>
        <td id="LC5352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5353"></td>
        <td id="LC5353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, come off it, you don&#39;t think we&#39;d let you go alone?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5354"></td>
        <td id="LC5354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5355"></td>
        <td id="LC5355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Of course not,&quot; said Hermione briskly. &quot;How do you think you&#39;d get to the Stone without us? I&#39;d better go and took through my books, there might be something useful...&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5356"></td>
        <td id="LC5356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5357"></td>
        <td id="LC5357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But if we get caught, you two will be expelled, too.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5358"></td>
        <td id="LC5358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5359"></td>
        <td id="LC5359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Not if I can help it,&quot; said Hermione grimly. &quot;Flitwick told me in secret that I got a hundred and twelve percent on his exam. They&#39;re not throwing me out after that.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5360"></td>
        <td id="LC5360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5361"></td>
        <td id="LC5361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After dinner the three of them sat nervously apart in the common room. Nobody bothered them; none of the Gryffindors had anything to say to Harry any more, after all. This was the first night he hadn&#39;t been upset by it. Hermione was skimming through all her notes, hoping to come across one of the enchantments they were about to try to break. Harry and Ron didn&#39;t talk much. Both of them were thinking about what they were about to do.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5362"></td>
        <td id="LC5362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5363"></td>
        <td id="LC5363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Slowly, the room emptied as people drifted off to bed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5364"></td>
        <td id="LC5364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5365"></td>
        <td id="LC5365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Better get the cloak,&quot; Ron muttered, as Lee Jordan finally left, stretching and yawning. Harry ran upstairs to their dark dormitory. He putted out the cloak and then his eyes fell on the flute Hagrid had given him for Christmas. He pocketed it to use on Fluffy – he didn&#39;t feel much like singing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5366"></td>
        <td id="LC5366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5367"></td>
        <td id="LC5367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He ran back down to the common room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5368"></td>
        <td id="LC5368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5369"></td>
        <td id="LC5369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We&#39;d better put the cloak on here, and make sure it covers all three of us – if Filch spots one of our feet wandering along on its own –&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5370"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5371"></td>
        <td id="LC5371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What are you doing?&quot; said a voice from the corner of the room. Neville appeared from behind an armchair, clutching Trevor the toad, who looked as though he&#39;d been making another bid for freedom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5372"></td>
        <td id="LC5372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC5373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Nothing, Neville, nothing,&quot; said Harry, hurriedly putting the cloak behind his back.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5374"></td>
        <td id="LC5374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5375"></td>
        <td id="LC5375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neville stared at their guilty faces.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5376"></td>
        <td id="LC5376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC5377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You&#39;re going out again,&quot; he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5378"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5379"></td>
        <td id="LC5379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, no, no,&quot; said Hermione. &quot;No, we&#39;re not. Why don&#39;t you go to bed, Neville?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5380"></td>
        <td id="LC5380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5381"></td>
        <td id="LC5381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry looked at the grandfather clock by the door. They couldn&#39;t afford to waste any more time, Snape might even now be playing Fluffy to sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5382"></td>
        <td id="LC5382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5383"></td>
        <td id="LC5383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You can&#39;t go out,&quot; said Neville, &quot;you&#39;ll be caught again. Gryffindor will be in even more trouble.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5384"></td>
        <td id="LC5384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC5385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You don&#39;t understand,&quot; said Harry, &quot;this is important.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5386"></td>
        <td id="LC5386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5387"></td>
        <td id="LC5387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Neville was clearly steeling himself to do something desperate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5388"></td>
        <td id="LC5388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5389"></td>
        <td id="LC5389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I won&#39;t let you do it,&quot; he said, hurrying to stand in front of the portrait hole. &quot;I&#39;ll – I&#39;ll fight you!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5390"></td>
        <td id="LC5390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5391"></td>
        <td id="LC5391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Neville, &quot;Ron exploded, &quot;get away from that hole and don&#39;t be an idiot –&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5392"></td>
        <td id="LC5392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5393"></td>
        <td id="LC5393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Don&#39;t you call me an idiot!&quot; said Neville. I don&#39;t think you should be breaking any more rules! And you were the one who told me to stand up to people!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5394"></td>
        <td id="LC5394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5395"></td>
        <td id="LC5395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, but not to us,&quot; said Ron in exasperation. &quot;Neville, you don&#39;t know what you&#39;re doing.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5396"></td>
        <td id="LC5396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5397"></td>
        <td id="LC5397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He took a step forward and Neville dropped Trevor the toad, who leapt out of sight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5398"></td>
        <td id="LC5398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5399"></td>
        <td id="LC5399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Go on then, try and hit me!&quot; said Neville, raising his fists. &quot;I&#39;m ready!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5400"></td>
        <td id="LC5400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5401"></td>
        <td id="LC5401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry turned to Hermione.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5402"></td>
        <td id="LC5402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5403"></td>
        <td id="LC5403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do something,&quot; he said desperately.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5404"></td>
        <td id="LC5404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5405"></td>
        <td id="LC5405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hermione stepped forward.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5406"></td>
        <td id="LC5406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5407"></td>
        <td id="LC5407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Neville,&quot; she said, &quot;I&#39;m really, really sorry about this.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5408"></td>
        <td id="LC5408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5409"></td>
        <td id="LC5409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She raised her wand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5410"></td>
        <td id="LC5410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5411"></td>
        <td id="LC5411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Petrificus Totalus!&quot; she cried, pointing it at Neville.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5412"></td>
        <td id="LC5412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5413"></td>
        <td id="LC5413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neville&#39;s arms snapped to his sides. His legs sprang together. His whole body rigid, he swayed where he stood and then fell flat on his face, stiff as a board.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5414"></td>
        <td id="LC5414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5415"></td>
        <td id="LC5415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hermione ran to turn him over. Neville&#39;s jaws were jammed together so he couldn&#39;t speak. Only his eyes were moving, looking at them in horror.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5416"></td>
        <td id="LC5416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5417"></td>
        <td id="LC5417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What&#39;ve you done to him?&quot; Harry whispered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5418"></td>
        <td id="LC5418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5419"></td>
        <td id="LC5419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s the full Body-Bind,&quot; said Hermione miserably. &quot;Oh, Neville, I&#39;m so sorry.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5420"></td>
        <td id="LC5420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5421"></td>
        <td id="LC5421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We had to, Neville, no time to explain,&quot; said Harry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5422"></td>
        <td id="LC5422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5423"></td>
        <td id="LC5423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You&#39;ll understand later, Neville,&quot; said Ron as they stepped over him and pulled on the invisibility cloak.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5424"></td>
        <td id="LC5424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5425"></td>
        <td id="LC5425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But leaving Neville lying motionless on the floor didn&#39;t feel like a very good omen. In their nervous state, every statue&#39;s shadow looked like Filch, every distant breath of wind sounded like Peeves swooping down on them. At the foot of the first set of stairs, they spotted Mrs. Norris skulking near the top.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5426"></td>
        <td id="LC5426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5427"></td>
        <td id="LC5427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, let&#39;s kick her, just this once,&quot; Ron whispered in Harry&#39;s ear, but Harry shook his head. As they climbed carefully around her, Mrs. Norris turned her lamplike eyes on them, but didn&#39;t do anything.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5428"></td>
        <td id="LC5428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5429"></td>
        <td id="LC5429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They didn&#39;t meet anyone else until they reached the staircase up to the third floor. Peeves was bobbing halfway up, loosening the carpet so that people would trip.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5430"></td>
        <td id="LC5430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5431"></td>
        <td id="LC5431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Who&#39;s there?&quot; he said suddenly as they climbed toward him. He narrowed his wicked black eyes. &quot;Know you&#39;re there, even if I can&#39;t see you. Are you ghoulie or ghostie or wee student beastie?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5432"></td>
        <td id="LC5432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5433"></td>
        <td id="LC5433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He rose up in the air and floated there, squinting at them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5434"></td>
        <td id="LC5434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5435"></td>
        <td id="LC5435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Should call Filch, I should, if something&#39;s a-creeping around unseen.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5436"></td>
        <td id="LC5436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5437"></td>
        <td id="LC5437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry had a sudden idea.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5438"></td>
        <td id="LC5438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5439"></td>
        <td id="LC5439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Peeves,&quot; he said, in a hoarse whisper, &quot;the Bloody Baron has his own reasons for being invisible.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5440"></td>
        <td id="LC5440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5441"></td>
        <td id="LC5441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Peeves almost fell out of the air in shock. He caught himself in time and hovered about a foot off the stairs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5442"></td>
        <td id="LC5442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5443"></td>
        <td id="LC5443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So sorry, your bloodiness, Mr. Baron, Sir,&quot; he said greasily. &quot;My mistake, my mistake – I didn&#39;t see you – of course I didn&#39;t, you&#39;re invisible – forgive old Peevsie his little joke, sir.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5444"></td>
        <td id="LC5444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5445"></td>
        <td id="LC5445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have business here, Peeves,&quot; croaked Harry. &quot;Stay away from this place tonight.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5446"></td>
        <td id="LC5446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5447"></td>
        <td id="LC5447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I will, sir, I most certainly will,&quot; said Peeves, rising up in the air again. &quot;Hope your business goes well, Baron, I&#39;ll not bother you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5448"></td>
        <td id="LC5448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5449"></td>
        <td id="LC5449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And he scooted off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5450"></td>
        <td id="LC5450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5451"></td>
        <td id="LC5451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Brilliant, Harry!&quot; whispered Ron.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5452"></td>
        <td id="LC5452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5453"></td>
        <td id="LC5453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A few seconds later, they were there, outside the third-floor corridor – and the door was already ajar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5454"></td>
        <td id="LC5454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5455"></td>
        <td id="LC5455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, there you are,&quot; Harry said quietly, &quot;Snape&#39;s already got past Fluffy.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5456"></td>
        <td id="LC5456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5457"></td>
        <td id="LC5457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seeing the open door somehow seemed to impress upon all three of them what was facing them. Underneath the cloak, Harry turned to the other two.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5458"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If you want to go back, I won&#39;t blame you,&quot; he said. &quot;You can take the cloak, I won&#39;t need it now.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5460"></td>
        <td id="LC5460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
